item.description:
Four on the Floor will be playing from 9-1 for our dance pleasure!
If you would like to come early for a bite to eat plan on gathering around 7:30 to gather tables. No reservations here in the bar area so every extra hand pulling tables together as they free up is appreciated. Please be sure to cover any bar tabs and food bills before leaving and don't forget to include tax and a tip. This is always a fun and well attended event, come out and dance, chat and meet some great people.
:-)
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather along the back wall next to the entrance.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Princeton Station: Four on the Floor
